objects.text:
• 100% Pure & Natural Whole Milk
• No artificial preservatives
• Rich in essential nutrients
• Fresh from local dairy farms

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Pure Dairy Milk - Straight from Nature's Source
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure & Natural Whole Milk
• No artificial preservatives or additives
• Rich in essential nutrients and calcium
• Fresh from local dairy farms
• Perfect for drinking, cooking, and baking
• Pasteurized for safety while maintaining natural taste
• Available in various sizes: Glass bottle and pitcher options
• Creamy texture and full-bodied taste
• Excellent source of protein and vitamins
• Ideal for daily family nutrition

banner_details:
The banner features a clean and modern design promoting a dairy product. It utilizes a diagonal gradient background transitioning from deep blue to a light sky hue, establishing a fresh and natural atmosphere. The main heading (`heading`) sits prominently at the top left, using bold typography in white to immediately catch attention. Below it, a tagline (`tagline`) reinforces the farm-to-home message. Supporting points (`description`) are listed with bullet icons, all in white. The price tag (`price`) is styled large and bold, emphasizing affordability. A call-to-action button (`cta_button` with `cta`) invites user interaction. A realistic milk bottle image (`product_image`) balances the design visually on the right.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #2A6B9C
- Soft Blue: #3E85B5
- Light Sky: #F0F8FF
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a clean, refreshing aesthetic, perfect for promoting dairy. The main color palette consists of Soft White (#FDFDFC), Milky Cream (#F5F5F0), Clear Glass Grey (#CFCFCF), and Cool Transparent Blue (#A5CBE0). The creamy white of the milk contrasts smoothly with the cool-toned blue reflections on the glass, creating a fresh and hygienic appearance. Subtle gradients of white and light grey blend naturally within the curves of the glass, highlighting transparency and purity. This harmonious mix emphasizes cleanliness and freshness, ideal for an ad banner background or text that conveys trust, health, and quality.
